mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO danzi_apply (danzi_id, hs_sbsc_acp_trg_cd_nm, sbsc_acp_st_dt, sbsc_acp_clsg_dt, rmk, ppr_sbm_ope_anc_dt, ppr_acp_st_dt, prp_acp_clsg_dt, pzwr_anc_dt, pzwr_ppr_sbm_st_dt, pzwr_ppr_sbm_ed_dt, ctrt_st_dt, ctrt_ed_dt) VALUES
(#{item.danziId}, #{item.hsSbscAcpTrgCdNm}, #{item.sbscAcpStDt}, #{item.sbscAcpClsgDt}, #{item.rmk}, #{item.pprSbmOpeAncDt}, #{item.pprAcpStDt}, #{item.pprAcpClsgDt}, #{item.pzwrAncDt}, #{item.pzwrPprSbmStDt}, #{item.pzwrPprSbmEdDt}, #{item.ctrtStDt}, #{item.ctrtEdDt})
